title: Drawing, ca. September 1853
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at top center:  moon/ blue / light edge / dark; again at upper right:  light; again at left center: lightish/ cloud; at center: light brown/ dusky; at center right: smoky warmish; again at lower center: Splendid Moon light / El Altar
description: Horizontal sketch containing parts of llamas grazing or watching at the top with a framing line beneath, and the moon above a cloudy sky over a mountain range with the El Altar, seen rising above a cloud in the distance.
